location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham Esquire, Secretary to Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham Esquire, Secretary to Government of Bombay, acknowledging the receipt of a command sent on 17 November 1810, informing that a supply of stationery was being delivered on board the Thetisbut, as the chest had to be thrown overboard, Bruce requests another supply to be delivered.
